TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 野笠薹草 ( 原变种) ye li tai cao (yuan bian zhong)

treatment.description: Culms 60–70 cm tall. Leaf blades 4–6 mm wide, glabrous or only pubescent on membranous part of sheaths. Utricles hispid on margins of beak. Fl. and fr. Jun–Aug.
treatment.distribution: Wet grasslands in forest regions. Heilongjiang, Jilin, Nei Mongol [Korea, Mongolia, Russia (Far East, E Siberia)].
treatment.discussion: The culms and leaves are used as animal feed.
